summary: Allows crafting of more powerful soul gems with multiple weaker soul gems via the use of any forge.
descriptionHtml:
3 Gem Fragments -> 1 Petty Soul Gem 
2 Petty Soul Gems -> 1 Lesser Soul Gem 
2 Lesser Soul Gem -> 1 Common Soul Gem 
2 Common Soul Gems -> 1 Greater Soul Gem 
2 Greater Soul Gems -> 1 Grand Soul Gem 
2 Filled Grand Soul Gems -> 1 Black Soul Gem
author: Burrito Burglar
